CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS INVOICE ( INVOICE_ID NUMERIC(20), INVOICE_NUMBER VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, INVOICE_AMOUNT DECIMAL(18,9) NOT NULL, INVOICE_DATE VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, INVOICE_DUE_DATE VARCHAR(50)NOT NULL, PAYMENT_DATE VARCHAR(50), STATUS VARCHAR(20), SUPPLIER_ID NUMERIC(20), CUSTOMER_ID NUMERIC(20), PAYMENT_TERM NUMERIC(20), DAYS_LATE NUMERIC(20), CUSTOMER_AVG_DELAY NUMERIC(20), DAYS_UNTIL_DUE NUMERIC(20), DAY_BETWEEN_INVOICE_AND_PAYMENT NUMERIC(20), CUSTOMER_ID_ENCODDED NUMERIC(20), CREATED_DATE TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, MODBYID NUMERIC(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, MODTS TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT LOCALTIMESTAMP, S3_PATH VARCHAR(100), CONSTRAINT VENDOR_PAYER_GL_CONNECTIONS_PK PRIMARY KEY(INVOICE_ID) ); COMMENT ON TABLE INVOICE IS 'This table stores information related to invoice lifeclycle.';
CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS INVOICE_SEQ INCREMENT 1 MINVALUE 1 NO MAXVALUE START 1 CACHE 20;
